description:
✰✰✰ Daily and Sunday Express – Read your favourite newspaper on your TouchPad today ✰✰✰ 

✰ Daily Express brings you the very best stories, news and features on your device, published in exceptional clarity, with an incredible touch screen experience allowing you to swipe through the paper. 

✰ Flip your device and read the newspaper as a double-page spread or tap the page selector to choose a specific page to fast-navigate to. You can also download and save individual pages to enjoy offline and when you are on the go. 

✰ Your Daily Express app features search functionality to find key-words relating to recent content and a zoom function to enable clearer reading of selected articles.

✰ Daily Express provides availability to all editions of the paper by incorporating subscriptions allowing the purchase of a one month or yearly subscription to the paper. 

✰ Your Daily Express app also includes features such as- 
♦ Search functionality to find key-words relating to recent content 
♦ Zoom function to enable clearer reading of selected articles 
♦ Flip your device in to landscape and read the newspaper as a double-page spread or tap the page selector to choose a specific page to fast-navigate to 
♦ You can also download and save individual pages to enjoy offline and when you are on the go 

Prices for the subscriptions are £7.99 for one month £85.00 for a year. Payment for this subscription will be charged to your account upon purchase. 

For any further information see http://subscriber.pagesuite-professional.co.uk/file/Website_Privacy_statement.-
